title: What is the Rome tennis schedule?
description: The men's semi-finals at the Internazionali BNL d’Italia will take place on Friday in Rome. Carlos Alcaraz and Lorenzo Musetti meet in a blockbuster rematch of their Monte-Carlo final. World No. 1 Jannik Sinner faces Tommy Paul. View Friday's full order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 16 MAY 2025 Campo Centrale - start 13:30 WTA - [6] Mirra Andreeva / Diana Shnaider vs [3] Sara Errani (ITA) / Jasmine Paolini (ITA) Not Before 15:30 ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) Not Before 19:00 WTA - Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL) vs Storm Hunter (AUS) / Ellen Perez (AUS) Not Before 20:30 ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA) Pietrangeli - start 13:30 ATP - [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) ATP - Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) vs [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Rome

Alcaraz vs. Musetti, Sinner vs. Paul on Friday

May 15, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia runs from 7-18 May. By ATP Staff

The men's semi-finals at the Internazionali BNL d’Italia will take place on Friday in Rome. Carlos Alcaraz and Lorenzo Musetti meet in a blockbuster rematch of their Monte-Carlo final. World No. 1 Jannik Sinner faces Tommy Paul.

{{player.PlayerCountryCode}}

{{player.Record}}

{{opponent.Record}}

{{opponent.PlayerCountryCode}}

  • {{player.Age ? player.Age : '-'}} Age {{opponent.Age ? opponent.Age : '-'}}

View Friday's full order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 16 MAY 2025
Campo Centrale - start 13:30
WTA - [6] Mirra Andreeva / Diana Shnaider vs [3] Sara Errani (ITA) / Jasmine Paolini (ITA)

Not Before 15:30
ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)

Not Before 19:00
WTA - Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL) vs Storm Hunter (AUS) / Ellen Perez (AUS)

Not Before 20:30
ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA)

Pietrangeli - start 13:30
ATP - [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR)
ATP - Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) vs [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER)
